Articles.Content: Also going to make some space station crew as the pics I've seen lately of ones on EVA have this patch.

I'll try anything you would like me to. And I will post feedback/screenshots haha

btw, I uploaded an image of the flags, just as a preview for those curious: http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v663/Justinfluegel/Flagpackv1_preview_zps499246c6.png

If you provide me some high res images or even low res, of the patches you are using I will make them into flags as well. So people can carry the flag and patch of the mission, if they choose.

Two things. 1. Superkerbals logo is on there. 2. - I'm a veteran EVE super cap pilot and no I wasn't on the losing side in B-R...

For the record I love EVE online - You will never find a more wretched hive of scum and villainy. And to all the haters - you could'nt have been very good at it...

Also for the record - Star Citizen Backer and looking forward to moar scum and villainy as I blatantly got the cutlass pack
yay command and conquer tiberium wars flags on there with Nod, GDI, and Steel Talons (which also look like a certain university's flag)
Edited March 13, 2014 by CERVERUS

http://i.imgur.com/Z3jSKEi.jpg

Very nice!

Very nice!

Thank you

http://i.imgur.com/Z3jSKEi.jpg

am i the onl that thinks that the black visor is creepy because i am so used to seeing a kerbals face inside the helmet that not seeing it reminds me of the time i saw this

i had lazor installed which cause this to happen

Bah! I'm giving up with helmet re-working for today...

Adding more mission patches!

Vostok 1 and 2 Koviet missions added. Currently doing Vostok 5/6. Next Soyuz 4, 11 & 19. Planning to add Salut and Mir station suits. Then for the Kerbal States and FASA its Mercury 3,4,9 and generic. Gemini 3,4,8,12 and generic. Apollo 8,13,15 plus generic, Skylab and ISS station suits.

Also going to make some space station crew as the pics I've seen lately of ones on EVA have this patch.

http://site.thespacestore.com/googleimages/eva.jpg

I not claiming anything... but my avatar is similar and is the patch (done) for my next pack... could you let me that one?

am i the onl that thinks that the black visor is creepy because i am so used to seeing a kerbals face inside the helmet that not seeing it reminds me of the time i saw this

http://i.imgur.com/K6x6WvY.jpg

i had lazor installed which cause this to happen

They do look a but weird, I need time to perfect it - only got reflective visors yesterday

I not claiming anything... but my avatar is similar and is the patch (done) for my next pack... could you let me that one?

I'm using the real patches where possible but make YOUR own patch in the same style and we can all have Proot suits!

It would be an honour for me as you made all this possible and a tribute to you!

I'm going to make my own "Skull" suits for when I play which I will release if people want them.

Edited March 9, 2014 by Green Skull

I'm using the real patches where possible but make YOUR own patch in the same style and we can all have Proot suits!

It would be an honour for me as you made all this possible and a tribute to you!

I'm going to make my own "Skull" suits for when I play which I will release if people want them.

I second that. Proot is an inspiration to us all haha

Time for my first tests... nerves are on edge haha.
How do you get the reflections to work? All you need is the latest version of texturereplacer and a correctly labeled visor texture that isn't transparent right?

How do you get the reflections to work? All you need is the latest version of texturereplacer and a correctly labeled visor texture that isn't transparent right?

That is correct. Works on my base install and my hi res picture taking version... Let me load my main on it.

*EDIT* On my main install I got the same problem as you. I reckon its a conflict with texture compressor as that's the only visual mod I run across all my installs and the other two that don't have it are fine.

Edited March 9, 2014 by Green Skull
Okay because i'm not getting anything, the reflections never appear and all i get is a solid plastic looking visor the only "reflection" is the sun glare which I'm pretty sure is stock

Okay because i'm not getting anything, the reflections never appear and all i get is a solid plastic looking visor the only "reflection" is the sun glare which I'm pretty sure is stock

Yes that is the stock effect. You using texture compressor on this particular install?
I noticed texture compressor is giving me issues too. I'm going to grab a clean KSP image and start with just texturereplacement mod, then see as I add mods which is effecting it.

Yes that is the stock effect. You using texture compressor on this particular install?

Yes, only the minor one though (not aggressive), and as I'm testing it now I think it could be to blame, I'll know for sure in about 20 seconds

EDIT: YEEEP, it's texturecompressor any idea why it'd stop the reflections?

Edited March 9, 2014 by Sippyfrog
This is all helping to debug the alpha release - thanks guys!
Oh, that also happened to me! I was wondering.....

hmm,... so I went to a clean install of KSP, added my flags, no problem. Added the custom kerbals to my saved persistents, no problem. EVA'd on Kerbin, generic default KSP suits. Not even the updated default suits. I'm going to tweak a little. Might have been an error since I added the new cfg files from the updated Texturereplacement (v1.1). I'll put the alpha on instead and see if it fixes it.

Only mod installed is Texturereplacer 1.1, with Kerbal States Alpha.
When I tried I deleted the whole texture replacer file and copied in the kerbal states alpha and it didnt work. let me try this on my other install... see if its my version of texture replacer
Nope copied file I sent out and works fine.

Got a fix to the problem from shaw over on the texture replacer thread. If you convert the reflective visor you want to try into a jpeg it will work with texture replacer. I will pre convert for next version so will be compatible with texture compressor!
